docs.snippet: The NBA charged Donald Sterling on Monday with damaging the league and its teams with his racist comments, setting up a June 3 hearing after which owners could vote to terminate his ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The NBA charged Donald Sterling on Monday with damaging the league and its teams with his racist comments, setting up a June 3 hearing after which owners could vote to terminate his ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers.

headline.main: NBA Charges Sterling, Sets Up June 3 Hearing
headline.print_headline: NBA Charges Sterling, Sets Up June 3 Hearing

docs.snippet: The Pacers waited all season for the playoff rematch with Miami....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Pacers waited all season for the playoff rematch with Miami.

headline.main: Pacers Pull Away, Top Heat 107-96 for 1-0 Lead
headline.print_headline: Pacers Pull Away, Top Heat 107-96 for 1-0 Lead
